titles.title: To require the administrative agency responsible for adjudicating claims under the workers' compensation provisions of title 5, United States Code, to select board certified physicians to provide second opinions.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1751-1752)
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety.

committee.subcommittee: Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety

bill.summary: 8/17/1994--Introduced. Requires the administrative agency to which the Secretary of Labor has delegated authority to adjudicate workers' compensation claims of Federal employees under civil service law to select only board-certified physicians to provide second opinions.
